title: Modernize your car or truck with this 10” touchscreen display for just $125.99
content:
Macworld

If you drive an old car, you probably enjoy the benefits of a more hands-on driving experience in a vehicle that’s easier to work on yourself. 

Of course, there are some downsides. Like none of the conveniences of a modern, smart-enabled vehicle linked to the web. However, you can bring your old car or truck screaming into the modern age with an add-on like this 10” Wireless Touchscreen Car Display.

Just mount it to your dash or windshield and this display instantly vaults an old “dumb” car into the 21st century. Powered by an Android 12 operating system supporting WiFi and Bluetooth connectivity as well as a universe of apps, this screen hosts full CarPlay and Android Auto compatibility, so users can stream music, follow map navigation in apps like Google Maps or Waze, receive messages, or make calls right from the screen.

Sporting a built-in speaker, play all your favorite mp3s, watch videos in a variety of formats, or even go old school and listen to FM radio stations.

When you’re ready to park, just shift into reverse and the screen can sync with your rearview camera and display helpful guidelines to help lead you into your parking space.

Feel like you’re driving a new vehicle by adding this 10” Wireless Touchscreen Car Display at nearly 40% off the regular price. Originally $199.99, it’s on sale now for just $125.99 with this limited-time offer.
